name: Ryusei
text:
...It's gotten pretty hot.
My sweat won't stop.

name: Ganran
text:
As expected, the heat of the volcano is different from a sauna.
Even I can't endure it for that long.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, it's scorching heat...
Everyone, don't forget to hydrate.
Hitomi, do you still have spare water?

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, I'm fine.
I didn't expect this to happen,
so I don't have much, but...

name: Hitomi
text:
Besides, since there's still some
wind coming in, I can still bear it...
Are you alright too, [Player]-san?

options.text: It's so hot I feel like I'm going to collapse...

text:
The group advanced deeper into Choco Volcano,
one step at a time.

Each time, heated winds blew from deeper inside,
gradually draining the heroes' stamina.

name: Ganran
text:
...Hmm. Due to the eruption,
the walls have collapsed,
and the path has changed quite a bit.

name: Ganran
text:
We've come quite a long way,
so I don't know the path from here on out.

name: Hitomi
text:
This is a one-way path,
so we just need to go straight, but...

name: reXer
text:
Ah, if the path splits,
we'll ask [Player] to trace the presence then.

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, I'm sorry as your guide,
but [Player], I'll be counting on you then.

[Player] nodded to Ganran,
who was scratching his head.

name: Ryusei
text:
[Player]-san, if you get tired, just say so!
Leave it to these arms!

options.text: Thank you, Ryusei-san, are you alright?

name: Ryusei
text:
I can still move a lot.
I'm confident in my stamina—!

name: Ryusei
text:
Battles might continue after this,
so it's better not to push yourself too much.

name: reXer
text:
Ryusei is really tough.
...I need to learn from him.
I have to train more.

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, thank you!
Once we defeat the monster and return to the village,
let's train together!

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, let's return safely.
To fulfill that promise too.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
That's a hot topic!
I'll join you then!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, we can't be weak here!
Let's blow away the heat!

Just as they all rekindled their spirits,
[Player] felt a presence stirring behind them.

name: Red Monster
text: —Giooooo...!!

name: Ganran
text:
...This monster. It seems to be the one that
stole the rock cacao from us earlier!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, just in time.
I'll defeat this guy and
take back the rock cacao!

name: reXer
text:
Hitomi, Ryusei!
Form up and let's fight!
Lure the enemy to solid ground away from the magma.

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, understood!
reXer-san, Ganran-san,
leave this side to us!

name: Ganran
text:
Alright, count on me, Hito-chan—
Wait, more monsters have appeared!

Other monsters appeared all of a sudden,
standing in the heroes' way.

name: Ryusei
text:
It's not just one...!
But with this many,
we can lure the enemy and—

name: Ryusei
text:
—Wait!
[Player]-san, look out!!
Taking advantage of the appearance of other monsters, one in particular leaped into the air.

Ignoring the heroes,
that monster headed straight for [Player].

[Player], surrounded by magma,
desperately lowered their stance to dodge.
However—

name: reXer
text: —[Player]!!

name: Ryusei
text:
...Make it in time!!
Haaah!!

Utilizing his muscular spring,
Ryusei cut in between [Player] and the monster.

Then, he caught the monster's sharp fangs with his arm,
killed its momentum, and kicked it away.

name: Ryusei
text:
—[Player]-san, are you alright?
Leave this to us.
Step back a little.

options.text: Your arm is injured, are you alright!?

name: Ryusei
text:
...Yeah, I'm fine.
I can still fight with this level of injury!

name: Ganran
text:
Why don't you take
some of this as well!?

name: Ganran
text: [Player], Ryusei! Are you alright!?

name: reXer
text:
This side is taken care of!
That Kaibutsu earlier was...!

Ganran and the others, still on guard,
rushed towards [Player].

However, the monster that bit Ryusei vanished without a sound,
as if it disappeared into the dark shadow.

name: Ganran
text:
...Damn it, did it get away!?
Ryusei, show me your injury first!

name: Hitomi
text:
[Player]-san! I have a first aid kit!
Please use it on Ryusei-san!

name: Ryusei
text:
Ow ow...
Thank you, Hito-chan.
Hahah, everyone, you're worrying too much already.

name: Ryusei
text:
I'll be fine.
It's really good that
[Player]-san isn't hurt—!

name: reXer
text:
[Player],
do you still sense the
presence of any monstered around?

In response to reXer's uneasy words,
[Player] shook their head.
After confirming the surroundings were safe, the group immediately moved behind a rock and began to administer first aid to Ryusei.

options.text: Because I was too slow to escape...

name: Ryusei
text:
[Player]-san...
I don't want you to make that face.
I'm happy I could protect you.

name: Ryusei
text:
Besides, the wound will heal quickly.
I heal fast, so there won't even be a scar—!

Ryusei smiled.
However, a painful wound, torn by the monster's sharp fangs,
was visible on his arm.

name: reXer
text:
...Ryusei, [Player].
Both of you...

name: reXer
text:
...No, let's rest a little.
Rushing won't bring good results.
Especially if there's a formidable enemy ahead.

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, that's right.
To help the wound heal a bit,
wash it and cool it with this.

Ganran took out the last hydration pack
from his luggage and offered it to Ryusei.

name: Ryusei
text:
...Are you sure, Ganran-san?
There's almost no water left—

name: Ryusei
text:
...No, thank you.
I'll use it sparingly.

Ryusei accepted the water and,
treating it as something precious,
opened the seal.

Then, as he washed his wound,
Ryusei began to speak,
connecting the words in his heart.

name: Ryusei
text:
...I talked about it a little before,
but I also got left behind in a monster outbreak once.

name: Ryusei
text:
At that time, I really couldn't do anything...
Before I knew it, a very strong hero had
embraced me and saved me.

name: Ryusei
text:
At that time, I was told,
'First, you yourself have to
become your own greatest hero'.

name: Ryusei
text:
I didn't even get to ask their name...
So, I decided to change myself and learn to like myself.

Ryusei muttered nostalgically,
then gazed at [Player].

name: Ryusei
text:
...[Player]-san, when I saw you about to be attacked,
I just rushed in without thinking.

name: Ryusei
text:
To become my own greatest hero...
That's what I thought, and that's how I came this far.
But—

name: Ryusei
text:
Before I knew it,
I had become a hero strong enough to protect you.

name: Ryusei
text:
I guess that's how that hero must have felt.
I feel like I understand that hero a little now.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, it's a victory we grasped because Ryusei moved instantly.
Although it escaped, we also repelled the Kaibutsu.

name: reXer
text:
...Ryusei worked hard and got closer
to the hero he admired.

name: reXer
text:
...Me, my father—
am I getting closer to "reXer"? .........

name: Ryusei
text:
reXer-kun, I think you're fighting really well!
I'm really happy when I get to talk to reXer-kun,
it's like having a younger brother!

Ryusei's words made reXer look back
at him with a surprised expression.

name: Ryusei
text:
You are always trying your best,
and you're seriously training to become like your father.

name: Ryusei
text:
You're also very active as a professional gamer!
...I wish I had worked as hard as reXer-kun back then.

name: reXer
text:
Ryusei... thank you.
You really thought of me that way.
I'm very happy, but a little surprised.

name: reXer
text:
I think it's admirable that
Ryusei pushes himself to train.

Ryusei shook his head slightly
in response to reXer.

name: Ryusei
text:
...My past self had nothing special like that.
So I really disliked myself—.

name: Ryusei
text:
Remember the child we met in the village
who was looking for rock cacao?

name: Ryusei
text:
I wanted to give that child the rock cacao,
because I felt like he was similar to my past self.

name: Ryusei
text:
...So, it might just be me meddling, but I couldn't leave him alone.
I didn't want him to become like my past self.

name: Ryusei
text:
Just as I was helped,
I wanted to show that child
strength and kindness too.

Ryusei bent his arm, checked his muscles,
and continued speaking quietly.

name: Ryusei
text:
...But, when I heard Hito-chan say earlier
that she had many days of worrying,
it finally hit me.

name: Ryusei
text:
I still hadn't honestly affirmed my past self,
thinking "it was good that I was like that back then".

name: Ryusei
text:
It's hard to accept the past, isn't it?
Because the past can't be changed.

name: Ryusei
text:
...I'm still so immature,
yet I acted so tough to that kid...

options.text: I don't think so at all.
Ryusei-san was cool at that time!

text:
Nodding at [Player]'s words, Ganran,
who had been listening quietly, spoke in a gentle tone.

name: Ganran
text:
...Ryusei.
You can proudly say that you love
your current self, right?

name: Ganran
text:
Both the self you became and the self
you were before changing, both are still you.
That hasn't changed.

name: Hitomi
text:
That's right, Ryusei-san!
I think your feelings are very important.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, the Ryusei from that time exists,
and the Ryusei who thought he'd try his best exists,
and the current Ryusei exists...

name: reXer
text:
Um...
I can't quite put it into words.

Scratching his head,
reXer gazed directly at Ryusei.

name: reXer
text:
Surely, if any of those Ryusei were missing,
the current Ryusei wouldn't exist, right?
So, I'm sure they're all important parts of you.

name: reXer
text:
I'm sure it's the same for me too.
The reason I can be reXer is because my past self existed—

name: reXer
text:
The efforts we've accumulated
are surely what we are now.
So, let's be proud!

reXer extended his hand to Ryusei.
Ryusei tightly squeezed that hand.

name: Ryusei
text:
reXer-kun...
Yeah, thank you!
I'm feeling a little more energetic!

name: Ryusei
text:
The time of hardship was an
important period for me, too...
Hito-chan also said that...

name: Ryusei
text:
That must be what we've accumulated—
our history!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes! Ryusei-san's feelings might be a
little different from when I was worried
about becoming an idol, but—

name: Hitomi
text:
Both the shining Ryusei now,
and the past Ryusei who worked hard
to change...

name: Hitomi
text: I think both of them are wonderful!

Hitomi smiled gently,
clenching both hands in front of her chest,
and spoke encouragingly to Ryusei.

name: Ryusei
text:
Thank you, Hito-chan.
I also love how Hito-chan is working so hard to become
an idol through various efforts!

name: Ryusei
text:
So, I want to love my past
self like Hito-chan does...
That's what I thought.

options.text: That child was also happy about the rock cacao.
That's something only Ryusei-san could do!
It's an act of returning love!

text: At [Player]'s words, Ryusei looked up in surprise.

name: Ryusei
text:
...I see.
I was able to give back
an act of love to that child, wasn't I?

name: Ryusei
text:
"An act of returning love"—
Yeah, just like the villagers and
everyone else did for me, I too...

name: reXer
text:
Ah, that's why I'm sure it'll be fine.
...I still haven't become a respectable adult like my father.

name: reXer
text:
But, I want to keep moving forward
in my own way while struggling—

name: reXer
text:
[Player] taught me that,
and that's how I felt.
...Though, this part is second-hand.

Glancing at [Player],
reXer smiled shyly and supported Ryusei's body up.

name: reXer
text:
I think it's fine for Ryusei to be just as he is.
So, why don't we try our best little by little, together?

name: Ryusei
text:
...Yeah, thank you, reXer-kun.
Ganran-san, I think I'm starting to understand how to try my best.
It's all thanks to everyone!

Ganran smiled back at the smiling Ryusei,
who stood up.

name: Ryusei
text:
...Everyone, I'm sorry!
My wound treatment is done,
so I'm fine now, perfectly good to go!

name: Ryusei
text: We can't afford to stay leisurely here forever.

name: Ryusei
text:
Let's move forward,
for the villagers are surely waiting for us...
the heroes!
Everyone nodded silently at Ryusei's words.

The low rumbling earthquakes that shook
Choco Volcano had increased in frequency.

The group moved deeper into the volcanic interior,
searching for a passable path.

name: reXer
text:
...It's finally time.
Everyone, let's prepare as much as possible.

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, [Player]-san, can you please transform us first?
That way we can fight immediately if something happens!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, that's right.
Like before, we don't know when a monster might attack...

name: Ganran
text:
The exhaustion can get severe, so [Player],
tell me immediately if it gets tough!

options.text: Understood, preparation is important after all.

name: Ryusei
text:
Thank you, [Player]!
Alright, everyone,
let's give it our all!

In response to Ryusei's words,
everyone nodded vigorously, encouraged by his words.

However, while nodding to that voice,
reXer gazed at his Parallel Weapon, deep in thought.

options.text: If there's any problem, tell me immediately.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, sorry, [Player]. I'm fine.
...I was just thinking a little.

Saying that, reXer looked up and gazed at Ryusei,
who was walking confidently.

name: reXer
text:
...I was thinking this when we were talking earlier too,
but Ryusei is really amazing.

name: reXer
text:
Just like the hero who saved him,
he's heading towards the ideal self he aims to be...

He swallowed his words there,
then gazed directly at [Player].

And, as if making a decision,
he grasped [Player]'s hand.

name: reXer
text:
...[Player]!
I have a favor to ask you.

name: reXer
text:
At the Hero Grand Prix,
[Player] observed Toshu and Shaft's new forms,
didn't you?

name: reXer
text:
...Just like back then,
can you observe "my" potential—?

reXer continued speaking
with a serious expression.

name: reXer
text:
Father, Hitomi, Ryusei...
I was unconsciously comparing myself to others.

name: reXer
text:
But that wasn't a mistake.
I realized what I was lacking,
and everyone gave me a chance to move forward.

name: reXer
text:
...What was wrong was that at some point,
I had convinced myself that "reXer"...
that my father was the limit I could reach.

name: reXer
text:
Since I boasted that I would "become a hero who surpasses my father"—
I want to overcome that limit with my own hands.

options.text: Can you clearly envision your current "dream"?
Tell me your own feelings, not reXer's.

text:
Nodding quietly at [Player]'s words,
reXer closed his eyes.

name: reXer
text:
...If I only imitate my father, I can never surpass "reXer".
So, I thought about various ways to do it.

name: reXer
text:
Hitomi, Ryusei, and Ganran,
the people from NeoTalents,
everyone I fought at the Hero Grand Prix...

name: reXer
text:
I referenced many things,
but just imitating someone wasn't enough.

name: reXer
text:
Every hero has accumulated different things,
so that's natural.

name: reXer
text:
What I've accumulated is also
different from my father...
from reXer.

options.text: You've accumulated things until now, right?
It's been that way since we met, so, I'm sure!

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, that time I fought with you
is also a part of who I am now, [Player].

name: reXer
text:
It might deviate from inheriting reXer,
but still.

name: reXer
text:
I'm sure I also have it.
—My own history.

options.text: Even if it's different from your father,
Because you're the reXer of now—

name: reXer
text:
...The battle just now,
my father might have overcome it differently.
But, if it were me—

name: reXer
text:
"What would I do"?
If I were to put all of my history into it
and come up with an answer...!

At that moment, words appeared on [Player]'s device,
as if it was responding to reXer's words.

name: Mobile Device
text:
—Connect to the path?
If you approve this action,
please tap the screen.

name: reXer
text:
So, I...
I want to fight with what I've accumulated—
with my own strength!

options.text: —I think we can do it now!

text:
reXer nodded vigorously
at [Player]'s words.

And, simultaneously with [Player]'s approval,
reXer's body was enveloped in a brand new color of light.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—Th-This form...!
[Player]!
You observed me!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Is this the power of my new hero suit...!
This costume is...

Bathed in dazzling light, Ryusei and the others,
who had been advancing, turned back with gasps of surprise.

name: Ganran
text:
Oh...!? Whoa, what happened!?
reXer's suit changed!?

name: Ryusei
text:
Whoa—, that's amazing—!
Is this also [Player]-san's "Observer" power?

name: Ryusei
text:
I've heard rumors about it,
but you can really transform
someone into a different form—!

name: Hitomi
text:
You did it, reXer-san!
It's wonderful and so like you!

options.text: It looks like a costume from a game.

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer (Volcano)
dialogue_after_selection.text: It's a little embarrassing to be told that directly...

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer (Volcano)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But thank you, [Player]!
It's very easy to move in and comfortable.
How is it, not bad, right?

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
My weapon is...
I see, a crossbow.
This is my Parallel Weapon...

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Amazing, it feels like a partner
I've been fighting with forever,
as it fits my hand perfectly.

reXer examined the changes
that had occurred to him,
carefully checking his body.

name: Ryusei
text:
Huh...?
Come to think of it,
I don't feel the heat near reXer-kun.

name: Hitomi
text:
You're right...!
It was so hot just a moment ago
that my sweat wouldn't stop...

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, that's thanks to this flying unit.
It absorbs the surrounding heat and
then radiates the stored energy as an attack.

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha! That's amazing!
With this, we'll be comfortable too!

—At that moment.
An eerie presence surged from deep
within the magma zone.

options.text: It seems our conversation is over.

text:
Turning their gaze at [Player]'s words,
small monsters began to appear in droves.

name: Hitomi
text:
...Kyaa!?
S-Such a large number of monsters...!

name: Ryusei
text:
It's going to be tough dealing with this many...!
Everyone, are you ready?

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, this time it's gonna perfect!
I'll knock them back as they come!

As Ganran gripped his hammer,
the rock in the ceiling collapsed,
and a large individual appeared from it.

name: Large Monster
text: —Gogooooo...!!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
A large monster has appeared.
[Player], is this the boss?

To reXer, who had his finger on his Parallel Weapon,
[Player] shook their head.

options.text: ...It seems to be a different monster from this one.
I feel a much larger presence...!

name: Ganran
text:
Even bigger than this one!?
...Gahahaha!
That's good, I'm fired up!

name: Ganran
text:
To lay eyes on that one's face,
let's take care of these guys in one go first!

name: Hitomi
text:
Yes, [Player]-san, please operate!
We have to move deeper quickly!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, I also need to show everyone
in battle that I'm fully recovered!

Responding to the heroes' gazes,
[Player] also operated the device.

options.text: Let's finish this in one go!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
"To become a reXer who surpasses my father"—
The reason I could have that dream is
because my father was there.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Both that dream and this suit,
everything is what I've accumulated!
I'll make them feel that power!

reXer strongly drew the string of his crossbow
and took a low stance.

Like a hunter stalking prey,
reXer gazed sharply at the monster.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—I'll engrave my accumulated
hunting skills into their eyes!
Battle Start

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—I'll achieve victory with my own fighting style!
...There!

options.text: This is a new combat style...!

text:
reXer's fiery arrows pierced the monster
swimming above the distant magma.

name: Young Monster
text: Gigii...!

name: Hitomi
text:
Amazing, he can defeat a monster
even from that far away!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
That's a good rhythm we've got going on!

name: Ganran
text:
reXer, aim for the big one in the back!
I'll take care of clearing the way around here!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, understood, Ganran!
Hitomi and Ryusei, I need your support!

name: Ryusei
text: Understood! Hito-chan, let's go all out!

name: Hitomi
text:
Understood!
[Player]-san, I need your ViewPower!

Receiving the ViewPower sent from [Player],
Hitomi's Parallel Weapon increased in radiance.

name: Hitomi
text:
Ganran-san, please!
—"Love Song"!
LOVE ME☆HITO-MI~!

Hitomi's singing voice echoed
throughout Choco Volcano.
Her voice, amplified by the power of her Parallel Weapon, spread outwards from Hitomi, shaking the heroes' souls.

name: Ganran
text:
Hito-chan, nice one!
Leave the rest to me!

name: Ganran
text:
I'll beat some sense into them!!
—"Forging"! Schmieden Schatz-axt!!

The surging monsters were instantly blown away
by the shockwave generated by Ganran's single swing.

name: Ryusei
text:
Alright, the path is clear!
reXer-kun, I'll return the favor of your kindness too!

name: Ryusei
text:
Now, receive this power!
—"Health and Beauty"! Pose of Reverse!!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, leave it to me!
This is a perfect target for testing out
my new Parallel Weapon!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Even if you're in the magma zone,
I'll shoot you down!
There's no safe zone for you!

reXer drew his bowstring to its limit
and loudly called out [Player]'s name.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—[Player]!
I need your ViewPower!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—"Pursuit"!
Oversync... no!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I'll show you my unique hunting style!!
Overlimit Execution!

The crimson light released from reXer's finger
pierced the monster's core, leaving a trail behind it.

name: Large Monster
text: —Goh, ooh...!!

The monster, with its core destroyed,
crumbled while violently scattering its rocky body.

name: Hitomi
text:
...[Player]-san!
reXer-san!
Be careful!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—What!?
Th-The wall is shaking...!?

options.text: Everyone, get away from the rock wall!
It looks like it's going to collapse...!

name: Ganran
text:
No! Get away from the monster!
The wall's going to collapse!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—[Player]!
Hold onto me!

reXer embraced [Player]'s body and
quickly leaped away from the spot.

Immediately after, with a violent tremor, the wall collapsed,
and magma overflowed from it as if a dam had broken.

name: Ryusei
text:
—Ah, hot!
Hito-chan, reXer-kun!
Are you alright over there!?

name: Hitomi
text:
N-No, I was away from the wall,
so I'm fine.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
We barely made it in time too...
If we had been even a little slower,
even this unit wouldn't have been able to absorb all the heat.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
[Player], are you unharmed?
If you touched it even a little,
you might have gotten burned.
reXer slowly lowered [Player] to the ground.

name: Ryusei
text:
...We've been separated.
Hmm... I guess we can't jump across this distance.

Between reXer,
Ryusei and the others, a river of magma had formed,
glowing with a reddish-black heat.

name: Ganran
text:
To cross here,
we'd need more than a few lives...!

name: Ganran
text:
Besides, there's a possibility that the collapsed area might expand.
We'll have to find another path.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...B-But, Ganran!
There's no guarantee we can
rejoin by taking another route, right?

name: Ryusei
text:
Hmm...
That's right, we don't have any means to
block the heat, nor do we have any water left.

name: Hitomi
text:
Besides, without [Player]-san's observation,
we don't know how long our transformations will last!

name: Ryusei
text:
Then it's alright.
I'll send an emergency request
to a remote operator—

However, when attempting to connect the device,
only noise flowed from it.

name: Ganran
text:
...Mine too.
Did something break from the
heat and battle impact?

name: Ryusei
text:
If that's the case, we can't even do simple battle streaming...
Ganran-san and I will have to observe each other.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Then, you two should return to the village first
and rendezvous with Obsidius and the others.

name: Ganran
text:
...But, since we can't go back that way,
we can't retrace the path we came from either.

Ryusei and Ganran quietly exchanged glances.
And then, they both nodded simultaneously.

name: Ganran
text:
...If that's the case,
there's only one thing to do, Ryusei!

name: Ryusei
text:
...Ganran-san.
—Yeah, that's right!

name: The Two of Them
text:
—'Prepare yourselves and push forward!', right!
—'Prepare yourselves and push forward!', right!?

The two laughed, bumping fists.
Sweat beaded on their foreheads.

name: Hitomi
text:
...N-No way! That's reckless!
There's no guarantee there's an exit...!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Is there... is there no way!?
If I could just get a little closer,
with my Parallel Weapon—

Even as they conversed, the magma flow expanded,
gradually taking away Ganran and the others' foothold.

name: Ganran
text:
—Iron Rule, number one!!
'Always live with hope'!
Leave this side to us!

name: Ganran
text:
We'll definitely rejoin you later!
...All three of you, it's a promise!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, Ganran-san and I are heroes!
We'll definitely keep our promise!

name: Ryusei
text:
...It's almost time to go!
It seems we can't stay any longer.

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, that's right. Well then, [Player]!
We're counting on you over there!

Ganran shouted with a spirited voice,
as if to encourage them.

[Player] sent all their ViewPower
to Ryusei and Ganran.

name: Ryusei
text:
Thank you, [Player]-san!
With this, even if a monster appears,
we can fight for a little while!

name: Ganran
text: ...Alright! Then, all three of you, see you later!

name: Hitomi
text:
...Understood.
Ganran-san, Ryusei-san, let's definitely rejoin!
Definitely!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, I believe in you two!
...Let's go too, [Player], Hitomi!

Ryusei and Ganran nodded to each other
and ran into the path ahead.

Seeing them off,
[Player] and the others also proceeded
down a different path.

Towards where the unsettling presence grew stronger,
—no one looked back.

Chapter 6:
Because I Knew the Pain of Loss

name: Ryusei
text:
...Hey, Ganran-san.
All three of them are kind, aren't they.

name: Ryusei
text: They worried about us so much.

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, that's right.
...We've got good companions.

name: Ganran
text:
...That's why we absolutely have to return.
We can't lose anything ever again.

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, let's go.
While we still have the strength everyone left us.

name: Ganran
text:
Yeah, let's go as far as we can.
...Even though we're separated now,
we must be connected somewhere.
